document_data.name: Mhorauk (given name unknown)
document_data.mainbody: Lord '''Mhorauk''' was a nobleman of [[Cormyr]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: He came off as a younger lordling, implying he was younger than other lordlings.
document_data.Relationships: He was known to the bodyguard of Lord [[Haelwing]], [[Oskrul Meddanthyr]].
document_data.History: Lord Mhorauk was at the [[Old King's Favorite]] eatery on one morning when Lord Haelwing got very drunk, and his wizardly bodyguard, Oskrul Meddanthyr, started drinking recklessly and talking about many subjects. He was not very courteous with the wizard, but got him to admit he didn't know who trapped [[the Nine]] into [[blueflame item]]s.
